headline: Is It Time To Revisit Automatic Data Processing (ADP) After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: Wondering whether Automatic Data Processing's current share price lines up with its long term potential and what that might mean for you as an investor? The stock closed at US$257.87, with a 1% decline over the last 7 days, roughly flat over 30 days at a 0.1% decline, a 2.0% gain year to date, a 11.3% decline over 1 year, and longer term returns of 24.8% over 3 years and 73.3% over 5 years. Recent market attention on Automatic Data Processing has been shaped by ongoing interest in payroll...
